languages.text: {n}Сервитор делает движение конечностями — будто бы взволнованное.{/n} "Значит, Номос поняли верно. Нам нравится это. Движение к цели. Познание со смыслом. Интересно, можем ли и мы нести частицу этого огня? Или она уже в нас? Ведь мы впитали часть тебя вместе с твоей кровью".

{n}The servitor moves its limbs as if in excitement.{/n} "So Nomos understood correctly. We are enjoying this. This movement toward a goal. This learning with a purpose. We wonder if we too can carry a mote of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."
languages.original_text: {n}Сервитор делает движение конечностями — будто бы взволнованное.{/n} "Значит, Номос поняли верно. Нам нравится это. Движение к цели. Познание со смыслом. Интересно, можем ли и мы нести частицу этого огня? Или она уже в нас? Ведь мы впитали часть тебя вместе с твоей кровью".

traits.locale_text: {n}The servitor moves its limbs as if in excitement.{/n} "So Nomos understood correctly. We are enjoying this. This movement toward a goal. This learning with a purpose. We wonder if we too can carry a lick of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

We wonder if we too can carry a lick of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

We wonder if we too can carry a lick of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

We wonder if we too can carry a lick of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

{n}The servitor moves its limbs as if in excitement.{/n} "So Nomos understood correctly. We are enjoying this. This movement toward a goal. This learning with a purpose. We wonder if we too can carry a mote of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

{n}The servitor moves its limbs as if in excitement.{/n} "So Nomos understood correctly. We are enjoying this. This movement toward a goal. This learning with a purpose. We wonder if we too can carry a mote of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

languages.text: {n}Le servitor se met à bouger dans tous les sens, comme s'il était enthousiaste.{/n} « Ainsi, nous avons compris le sujet correctement. Nous aimons cela... Ce mouvement vers un objectif, cet enseignement dans un but précis. Nous nous demandons si, nous aussi, nous pouvons porter une étincelle de cette flamme... ou peut-être est-il déjà en nous ? Après tout, nous avons absorbé une partie de vous avec votre sang. »
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor moves its limbs as if in excitement.{/n} "So Nomos understood correctly. We are enjoying this. This movement toward a goal. This learning with a purpose. We wonder if we too can carry a mote of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor se met à bouger dans tous les sens, comme s'il était enthousiaste.{/n} « Ainsi, nous avons compris le sujet correctement. Nous aimons cela... Ce mouvement vers un objectif, cet enseignement dans un but précis. Nous nous demandons si, nous aussi, nous pouvons porter un brandon de cette flamme... ou peut-être est-il déjà en nous ? Après tout, nous avons absorbé une partie de vous avec votre sang. »

languages.text: {n}奴工活动着四肢，好像很兴奋。{/n}“所以诺莫斯理解得没错。我们很喜欢这种带有目标的行动，以及带有目的的学习。我们想知道，我们是否也能携带这一星火焰，或者说它已经在我们体内了？毕竟，我们已经吸收了你一部分血液。”
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor moves its limbs as if in excitement.{/n} "So Nomos understood correctly. We are enjoying this. This movement toward a goal. This learning with a purpose. We wonder if we too can carry a mote of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}奴工活动着四肢，好像很兴奋。{/n}“所以诺莫斯理解得没错。我们很喜欢这种带有目标的行动，以及带有目的的学习。我们想知道，我们是否也能携带这一星火焰，或者说它已经在我们体内了？毕竟，我们已经吸收了你一部分血液。”

languages.text: {n}Der Servitor bewegt seine Glieder, als wäre er aufgeregt.{/n} "Nomos verstehen also richtig. Wir haben Freude daran. An dieser Bewegung zu einem Ziel hin. An diesem Lernen mit einem Zweck. Wir fragen uns, ob auch wir einen Splitter dieser Flamme tragen können. Oder ist er schon in uns? Wir haben schließlich einen Teil von Euch mit Eurem Blut absorbiert."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor moves its limbs as if in excitement.{/n} "So Nomos understood correctly. We are enjoying this. This movement toward a goal. This learning with a purpose. We wonder if we too can carry a mote of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servitor bewegt seine Glieder, als sei er aufgeregt.{/n} "Nomos verstehen also richtig. Wir haben Freude daran. An dieser Bewegung zu einem Ziel hin. An diesem Lernen mit einem Zweck. Wir fragen uns, ob auch wir eine Zunge dieser Flamme tragen können. Oder ist sie schon in uns? Wir haben schließlich einen Teil von Euch mit Eurem Blut absorbiert."

languages.text: {n}El servidor, excitado, mueve sus extremidades.{/n} «Así que Nomos estaban en lo cierto. Lo estamos disfrutando. Un movimiento con un fin. Un aprendizaje con un propósito. Nos preguntamos si nosotros también podemos llevar una chispa de esta llama. ¿O ya vive en nuestro interior? Después de todo, al absorber tú sangre, tenemos una parte de usted».
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor moves its limbs as if in excitement.{/n} "So Nomos understood correctly. We are enjoying this. This movement toward a goal. This learning with a purpose. We wonder if we too can carry a mote of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor, excitado, mueve sus extremidades.{/n} «Así que Nomos estaban en lo cierto. Lo estamos disfrutando. Un movimiento con un fin. Un aprendizaje con un propósito. Nos preguntamos si nosotros también podemos llevar una chispa de esta llama. ¿O ya vive en nuestro interior? Después de todo, al absorber tú sangre, tenemos una parte de ti».

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターは興奮するように四肢を動かした。{/n}「つまり、ノモスは正しく理解しているということか。私たちは、これを楽しんでいる。目標に向かうこの動きが喜ばしい。目的を持って学ぶことが楽しい。私たちもこの炎を少しでも掲げることができるだろうか。それとも、すでに私たちの中にあるのだろうか？あなたの血とともにあなたの一部を吸収した身であるから、その可能性もあるのでは？」
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor moves its limbs as if in excitement.{/n} "So Nomos understood correctly. We are enjoying this. This movement toward a goal. This learning with a purpose. We wonder if we too can carry a mote of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターは興奮するように四肢を動かした。{/n}「つまり、ノモスは正しく理解しているということか。私たちは、これを楽しんでいる。目標に向かうこの動きが喜ばしい。目的を持って学ぶことが楽しい。私たちもこの炎を少しでも掲げることができるだろうか。それとも、すでに私たちの中にあるのだろうか？あなたの血とともにあなたの一部を吸収した身であるから、その可能性もあるのでは？」

languages.text: {n}Hizmetör, heyecanlanmış gibi uzuvlarını oynatıyor.{/n} "Yani Nomos doğru anladı. Bundan... Hedefe yönelik bu hareketten... Bu amaçlı öğrenmeden keyif duyuyoruz. Biz de bu alevin bir zerresini taşıyabilir miyiz diye merak ediyoruz. Yoksa zaten içimizde mi? Ne de olsa kanınızla bir parçanızı emdik."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor moves its limbs as if in excitement.{/n} "So Nomos understood correctly. We are enjoying this. This movement toward a goal. This learning with a purpose. We wonder if we too can carry a mote of this flame. Or is it inside us already? We have, after all, absorbed a part of you with your blood."

Biz de bu alevin bir zerresini taşıyabilir miyiz diye merak ediyoruz. Yoksa zaten içimizde mi? Ne de olsa kanınızla bir parçanızı emdik."
